TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
I will grant your wish by not granting it.

I wish my rockets would reach more than 50 meters up.
Granted, but that is only because they are 51 metres tall.

Granted, but that is only because they are 51 metres tall.

Egads, lad! Are you batty? You leave not a request in your statement as of late, therefore, this thread is doomed, doomed I say!

I wish that I had the voice of Peewee Herman, the body of Shaquille O' Neal, and the mentality of Jack O' Neill for one day.

Edited November 25, 2014 by turkwinif

Granted, but you are immediately recruited for a hot and Cold commercial involving *stuff*

I wish for a Pacific Rim mod for KSP

Granted. The Jaegers have QWOP controls.

I wish PC gaming was more about gaming and less about messing with settings.

Granted, but you cannot ever do it.

I wish for a better way to simulate 5m parts with stock.

Granted. The settings are automatically set, so you open up a game only to find that the settings are set to "Beyond Freaking Realistic Brah". This causes your CPU, GPU, and other system components to turn into a ball of plasma. This ball rapidly expands and completely destroys your home, killing you and anyone else in it.

I wish that notes weren't so booooooring.

Granted, you can no longer study by them (hope you meant those kind of notes)

I wish for a better wish.

Granted. The corruption goes from 25% to 100%.

I wish for Steam.

Granted. But it turns out to be mere vapourware.

I wish for stream.

Granted. It flows away.

I wish for 1 gram/s.

Granted. It flows away.

I wish for 1 gram/s.

Granted, but it's of human excrement.

I wish I could download, and watch/listen to every TV show ever made.

Granted. As you're downloading the TV shows, a natural gas pipe bursts outside. The gas silently floats about when it encounters a short-circuited snail massager, causing the gas to detonate and kills you.

I wish I had a cat.

Granted.

I wish I could sleep.

Granted, when your sleeping a JATO rocket is lit by a terrorist and aimed at your house ready to kill you when you wake.

i wish to go to space!

Granted. You get to space and accidentally launch yourself on an interstellar trajectory using the fuel you were saving for a deorbit burn.

I wish I had a B-29.

Granted, you have it on a combat approach course to the place you live.

I wish my work was closer to my home.

Granted. Your coworkers move in with you.

I wish the four day work week became a reality.

Granted but a week now lasts four days.

I wish my car could propel itself without gasoline.

granted, but it runs on farts and kills whoever sniffs it.

i wish for the I like trains kid.

Granted. It is propelled by a fission reactor that, when you crash, spills everywhere and kills everyone.

I wish for more cowbell.

Edit: Ninja'd....

Edited November 25, 2014 by DovaJeb

Granted. It is propelled by a fission reactor that, when you crash, spills everywhere and kills everyone.

I wish for more cowbell.

Edit: Ninja'd....

Granted, but you're obliged to wear them all on your neck.

I wish humans could grow their broken teeth back.

Granted. But they don't stop growing by themselves. You're the first known case and only after your brain is pierced by your own molars, leaving you alive but reduced to a state of incoherence, helplessness, and incontinence, is a treatment to halt tooth growth found.

I wish I wasn't so imaginative.

granted. you can only use stock craft in KSP

i wish asdfmovie was real

It's so real now when some one watches one they die

I wish i had a JATO rocket
